Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Hope you have had a a great time working on NCS with The Challenge programme.
Your timetable and further information for NCS: Real Challenge Action September weekends is now available; please login to the Staffing Website to view this information.
Click here to login to the website https://staffing.the-challenge.org/secure/MyRole.aspx
Pilot Waves
If you have worked on a pilot and completed the last section of the program, NCS: Real Challenge Action, please let your staffing associate know if you are able to work on any of the September weekends.
Any questions, please contact your staffing associate.
Best wishes,
NCS with The Challenge
